name: @eso-status/types
description: Library containing all data types for the @eso-status solution
author: @dov118 <contact@dov118.dev> (https://dov118.dev)

scripts.build: rm -R -f lib/* && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && rm -f index.d.ts && rm -f index.js && cat lib/type/**/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/type/**/*.js >> index.js && cat lib/type/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/type/*.js >> index.js && cat lib/const/**/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/const/**/*.js >> index.js && cat lib/interface/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/interface/*.js >> index.js && rm -R -f lib && echo "import { Moment } from 'moment';" >> temp.index.d.ts && grep -v "import " index.d.ts >> temp.index.d.ts && mv temp.index.d.ts index.d.ts && awk '!/defineProperty/' ./index.js > index.temp.js && mv index.temp.js ./index.js && awk '!/sourceMappingURL/' ./index.js > index.temp.js && mv index.temp.js ./index.js && awk '!/void 0/' ./index.js > index.temp.js && mv index.temp.js ./index.js && rm -rf temp && sed -i -e 's/declare const/export declare const/g' index.d.ts && awk '!/export default/' ./index.d.ts > index.temp.d.ts && mv index.temp.d.ts ./index.d.ts && sed -i -e 's/const /exports./g' index.js && awk '!/exports.default/' ./index.js > index.temp.js && mv index.temp.js ./index.js && rm -rf index.d.ts-e && rm -rf index.js-e
